ConfigItem.Name: Frontend::Module###AgentCustomerInformationCenter
ConfigItem.Description: Frontend module registration for the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: AgentCustomerInformationCenter::Backend###0510-CIC-TicketStats
ConfigItem.Description: Parameters for the dashboard backend of the customer id ticket stats of the agent interface. "Group" is used to restrict the access to the plugin (e. g. Group: admin;group1;group2;). "Default" determines if the plugin is enabled by default or if the user needs to enable it manually. "CacheTTLLocal" is the cache time in minutes for the plugin.

ConfigItem.Name: AgentCustomerInformationCenter::Backend###0520-CIC-TicketStats2Weeks
ConfigItem.Description: Parameters for the dashboard backend of the customer id ticket two week stats of the agent interface. "Group" is used to restrict the access to the plugin (e. g. Group: admin;group1;group2;). "Default" determines if the plugin is enabled by default or if the user needs to enable it manually. "CacheTTLLocal" is the cache time in minutes for the plugin.

ConfigItem.Name: AgentCustomerInformationCenter::Backend###0530-CIC-TicketStats1Month
ConfigItem.Description: Parameters for the dashboard backend of the customer id ticket one month stats of the agent interface. "Group" is used to restrict the access to the plugin (e. g. Group: admin;group1;group2;). "Default" determines if the plugin is enabled by default or if the user needs to enable it manually. "CacheTTLLocal" is the cache time in minutes for the plugin.

ConfigItem.Name: AgentCustomerInformationCenter::Backend###0140-CIC-CustomerServices
ConfigItem.Description: Parameters for the dashboard backend of the customer assigned services widget of the agent interface . "Group" is used to restrict the access to the plugin (e. g. Group: admin;group1;group2;). "Default" determines if the plugin is enabled by default or if the user needs to enable it manually. "CacheTTLLocal" is the cache time in minutes for the plugin.

Hash.Item: Shows all assigned services for the selected customer.

ConfigItem.Name: AgentCustomerInformationCenter::Backend###0500-CIC-CustomerInfo
ConfigItem.Description: Parameters for the dashboard backend of the customer login status widget of the agent interface . "Group" is used to restrict the access to the plugin (e. g. Group: admin;group1;group2;). "Default" determines if the plugin is enabled by default or if the user needs to enable it manually. "CacheTTLLocal" is the cache time in minutes for the plugin.

ConfigItem.Name: AgentCustomerInformationCenter::Backend###0901-CIC-SearchTemplate01
ConfigItem.Description: Parameters for the dashboard backend of the search template tickets overview of the agent interface. "Limit" is the number of entries shown by default. "Group" is used to restrict the access to the plugin (e. g. Group: admin;group1;group2;). "Default" determines if the plugin is enabled by default or if the user needs to enable it manually. "CacheTTLLocal" is the cache time in minutes for the plugin.

"CacheTTLLocal" is the cache time in minutes for the plugin.

ConfigItem.Name: AgentCustomerInformationCenter::Backend###0710-CIC-RemoteDBList001
ConfigItem.Description: Parameters for the customer dashboard backend remote DB dashlet.

ConfigItem.Name: Frontend::Module###CustomerDashboardRemoteDBAJAXHandler
ConfigItem.Description: Frontend module registration for the agent interface.

FrontendModuleReg.Description: AJAX handler for customer dashboard module RemoteDB.
FrontendModuleReg.Title: Customer Dashboard RemoteDB AJAX Handler

ConfigItem.Name: AgentCustomerInformationCenter::Backend###0270-CIC-FurtherInformation
ConfigItem.Description: Parameters for the customer dashboard backend to provide and save further information for customer user or customer company. "Group" is used to restrict the access to the plugin (e. g. Group: admin;group1;group2;). "RwGroup" is used to restrict the writing access to the plugin. "Default" determines if the plugin is enabled by default or if the user needs to enable it manually. "CacheTTLLocal" is the cache time in minutes for the plugin.

ConfigItem.Name: Frontend::Module###CustomerDashboardFurtherInformationAJAXHandler
ConfigItem.Description: Frontend module registration for the agent interface.

FrontendModuleReg.Description: AJAX handler for customer dashboard module Further Information.
FrontendModuleReg.Title: Customer Dashboard Further Information AJAX Handler

ConfigItem.Name: AgentCustomerInformationCenter::Backend###0600-CIC-CustomerCompanyInformation
ConfigItem.Description: Parameters for the dashboard backend of the customer company information of the agent interface . "Group" is used to restrict the access to the plugin (e. g. Group: admin;group1;group2;). "Default" determines if the plugin is enabled by default or if the user needs to enable it manually. "CacheTTLLocal" is the cache time in minutes for the plugin.
